mapper.select: select count(*) from designer where PERM_YN='Y'

select * from( select d.id, d.name, d.major, nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, rownum as rnum from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d where perm_yn = 'Y' ) group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id where perm_yn ='Y') where rnum between 1 and 6

select d.id, d.name, d.major, nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')fileUuid, nvl2(f.file_state,f.file_state,0)fileState from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d where cut_yn = 'Y' ) group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id left join ( select file_state, file_uuid, des_id from files where file_state='pro' )f on d.id = f.des_id where cut_yn ='Y'

select d.id, d.name, d.major, nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')fileUuid, nvl2(f.file_state,f.file_state,0)fileState from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d where perm_yn = 'Y' ) group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id left join ( select file_state, file_uuid, des_id from files where file_state='pro' )f on d.id = f.des_id where perm_yn ='Y'

select d.id, d.name, d.major, nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')fileUuid, nvl2(f.file_state,f.file_state,0)fileState from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d where makeup_yn = 'Y' ) group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id left join ( select file_state, file_uuid, des_id from files where file_state='pro' )f on d.id = f.des_id where makeup_yn ='Y'
select r.title, r.rate,r.des_id, m.name as mName from review r join member m on m.id = r.mem_id where des_id= #{id}
select d.id,nvl2(f.file_state,f.file_state,0)as filestate, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')as fileuuid from designer d left join files f on d.id = f.des_id where d.id = #{id}

select d.id, d.name, d.major, nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, c.detail,c.price, c.title,c.cour_no from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d ) group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id join(select id,price,detail,title,cour_no from des_course c) c on c.id = d.id where d.id= #{id}

select d.id , d.name , d.major , nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')as file_uuid from designer d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d ) group by des_id)r on d.id = r.des_id left join (select file_uuid, file_name,des_id from files where file_state='pro')f on d.id = f.des_id where id in ( select id from des_course where title like'%'||#{search}||'%' or detail like'%'||#{search}||'%' ) or major like'%'||#{search}||'%' or name like'%'||#{search}||'%'
